hero.title: PHP Backend
hero.subtitle: Crafting robust server-side solutions with modern technologies. Passionate about clean code, scalable architectures, and continuous learning.
hero.description1: Hello! I'm a passionate PHP backend developer with expertise in building scalable web applications. I specialize in Laravel framework, PostgreSQL databases, and modern frontend technologies like React and TypeScript.
hero.description2: My approach combines solid backend fundamentals with contemporary development practices, always focusing on clean, maintainable code and exceptional user experiences.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for building modern, scalable web applications

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work in backend development and full-stack applications

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution built with Laravel and React. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

api.title: API Management System
api.description: RESTful API with comprehensive documentation, rate limiting, and monitoring. Built for scalability with microservices architecture.

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced filtering capabilities.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Business intelligence dashboard with data visualization, custom reports, and automated insights for decision making.

history.title: My IT Journey
history.subtitle: The evolution of a passionate developer - from first lines of code to modern architectures

2018.title: First Steps in Programming
2018.description: Started learning programming with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Built my first static websites and discovered my passion for web development.

2019.title: Backend Discovery
2019.description: Discovered PHP and fell in love with server-side development. Started building dynamic websites and learning about databases.

2020.title: Laravel Framework
2020.description: Mastered Laravel framework and modern PHP practices. Built my first full-stack applications with proper MVC architecture.

2021.title: Database Expertise
2021.description: Deep dive into PostgreSQL and database design. Learned about optimization, indexing, and complex query structures.

2022.title: Modern Frontend
2022.description: Expanded skills to include React and TypeScript. Started building modern SPAs and improved my full-stack capabilities.

2023.title: Professional Growth
2023.description: Focused on scalable architectures, microservices, and DevOps practices. Mentoring junior developers and leading projects.

2024.title: Continuous Evolution
2024.description: Staying current with latest technologies, exploring AI integration, and building more sophisticated applications.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Ready to discuss your next project or explore collaboration opportunities? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.description: I'm always interested in discussing new opportunities, whether it's a challenging backend project, full-stack development, or consulting on modern web architectures.

footer.copyright: © 2024 PHP Developer Portfolio. Built with React, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS.
footer.crafted: Crafted with ❤️ and modern web technologies
